import React, { useState } from 'react' import { button } from 'bootstrap' const Add = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [address, setAddress] = useState(''); return (
setName(e.target.value)}/>
setEmail(e.target.value)}/>
